title: Ticket #6345: Fix coverity-found bugs since 8.7.0
description: CMS is reporting a very slow memory leak in the collector in 8.7.1. We will re-run coverity, and look for leaks, but any easy fixes we find along the way will get put under this ticket.
check_ins:

I think we can assume that all machines are SMPs now. And move the delete of m_attrs to catch other uses [...] (By Jaime Frey )
